The Jade Mask

helmet (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 196
armor id [armor]: 45 (Jade Mask)
protection, head [prothead]: 20
magic bonus [boosters]: +DD
restricted [restricted]: #15 EA C'tis - Lizard Kings
#57 MA C'tis - Miasma
#93 LA C'tis - Desert Tombs
darkvision [darkvision]: 50
magic resistance [mr]: +3
regeneration [regeneration]: 5%
resist poison [poisonres]: +15
spell [itemspell]: #939 Rigor Mortis
fear [fear]: +10
restriction [cannotwear]: can only be worn by coldblooded units

Requires 60D15N to forge (D6N3)

This powerful mask will spread fear among all enemies nearby and will grant its wearer regeneration, partial poison resistance and increased magic resistance. It will also greatly increase its wearer's skill in Death Magic and may fatigue all living beings present on a battlefield. The mask can only be used by cold-blooded beings.
